author: Madurai Bureau
text:
Collector S. Natarajan administered anti-untouchability pledge to officials and staff, marking the observance of Martyrs Day on Friday.

After observing silence for two minutes as a mark of respect to Mahatma Gandhi, who was assassinated on January 30, the Collector administered the pledge against practice of untouchability and allegiance to constitution to the Collectorate staff. With Saturday being a holiday, the district administration observed the day on Friday.

District Revenue Officer M. Ali Akbar and heads of various departments took the pledge.

Sivaganga

In Sivaganga, Collector S. Malarvizhi administered the pledge to DRO Ilango and staff members of various departments.

Dindigul

Collector T.N. Hariharan administered anti-untouchability pledge to officials and staff here on Friday. District Revenue Officer M. Nagendran and others also took the pledge. In Theni Collector N. Venkatachalam administered the pledge.
title: Untouchability pledge administered
